name: ThreeBellCapital
0:
”Alexa, ask three bell capital to tell me about the ceo”
”Alexa, ask three bell capital to tell me about the company”
”Alexa, ask three bell capital to play the latest update”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: three bell capital
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Hear the latest viewpoint on market events from your financial advisors at Three Bell Capital. Enable this skill then say, "Alexa, play the latest update from Three Bell Capital."

Other things you can ask (first say, "Alexa, open Three Bell Capital"):

"Tell me about the company."
"Tell me about the CEO."
"Tell me about Jon Porter."
"Tell me about the Managing Partner."

Request an invite to launch your own custom Alexa skill like this at WealthVoice.ai
